div.class: MAINjumbotron jumbotron col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12

p.strong: Mondays: Pick-up and Drop off Day 7 am - 6 pm - South Doors
p.br:
In addition to the Pick-up Drop off Day, there is now a drop box available for turning in homework.
It is located in the vestibule of the south entrance and is available school days 7am to 4pm
Library materials can also be turned in here.

br.p:
ACGC Public Schools will join #BeTheLightMN and light up our Football Field in Grove City on Mondays at 9:00 PM for 20 minutes and 20 seconds. In addition, the lights at Kingery Field in Atwater and the Softball Park in Cosmos will be aglow simultaneously. Three towns, united as one, shining bright in support of our ACGC students, athletes, staff, alumni, and community. It is our hope that during these uncertain times these beacons of light will bring us all hope as we long to once again be gathering at these special places together.
Please do not gather but rather admire while practicing safe social distancing. Stay safe and stay healthy.

br.h2: ACGC School Age Care – Kids Are Great
br.p:
Following the directive of the MN Department of Education, ACGC’s School Age Care will be suspended until in-person school resumes. This will begin on March 18, 2020
Childcare for emergency workers is available during the regular school hours from 7:30 to 4:00, Mondays-Fridays. This is free school-age care for the children of emergency workers (including providers of healthcare, emergency medical services, long-term and post-acute care; law enforcement personnel; personnel providing correctional services; public health employees; firefighters and other first responders; and court personnel)
We will need to provide an employment badge or paystub to confirm you are an emergency worker.
Please call 320-244-4623 to reserve a spot for your children.

br.h2: ALL community education classes are postponed until further notice
Perception Survey of ACGC School District

div.p: The ACGC 5-12 Staff wanted to share what they are doing while social distancing, when not doing school work.

div.p: REMINDER: ACGC Elementary Fall 2020 Kindergarten Registration is by phone only.
Junior High Spring Sports for the 2020 season have been cancelled

ACGC Community Ed Youth Dance will begin on May 11th and will be on May 18th, May 26th(Tuesday), June 1st (picture day), June 2nd (Tuesday), June 8th, 15th, 22nd, 23rd (Tuesday, dress rehearsal), June 29th is the Recital.

2020-21 Preschool registration is open. We are taking online registrations. You can register by going to the Early Childhood link located on the ACGC School Website under the Early Childhood section or Click Here

div.div:
Pre-K thru 4th Start time is 8:00.
End Time is 3:50.
Buses leave at 3:55.

5-12 School Start time is 7:45
End Time is 3:30
Buses leave at 3:35

div.h3: Thank you for visiting our website.
div.h4: We are a school that offers:

ul.li: Personal and caring staff who are committed to each student.
High expectations of our learners, raising each of them to rigorous units of study.
Individualized attention to student academic needs for adaptations and interventions.

div.p: At ACGC, we pay close attention to creating a safe and welcoming environment where students become successful socially and academically. Each day students have opportunities throughout their education careers from early learning school through our high school which offers college course work through both the University of Minnesota and Southwest Minnnesota State University.
div.h4: At Atwater Cosmos Grove City Public Schools we believe:

ul.li: School promotes a supportive educational environment where every person has dignity and worth.
School will provide experiences which allow the student to realize his/her fullest potential.
Students, staff, parents and community members working together are our most important strength in making our school district successful.
Every student should be prepared to be a productive citizen in a global society because our children are our future.

div.h4: Please contact one of our administrative team if you have questions about selecting ACGC for your child's education.

div.h6: Elementary Pre-K to Grade 4 Principal and Title I Coordinator

div.h4: We would be happy to answer any questions about how ACGC Innovates.
